News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v York City
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v York City
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v York City
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League home match against York City tomorrow
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking at home comforts on Saturday following back to back away defeats to the hands on playoff chasing rivals.

The Minsterman continue their push for safety following their 5-3 win over Southport on Saturday. The Yorkshire side currently sit 22nd in the league, five points below Maidstone in 20th position.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Aldershot 3-1 Daggers
Barrow 2-1 Daggers
Daggers 2-1 Forest Green 
Gateshead 1-0 Daggers 
Daggers 1-2 Maidstone 

York City
York 5-3 Southport 
Lincoln 1-0 York (FA Trophy)
York 2-1 Lincoln (FA Trophy)
Sutton 2-2 York
York 3-1 Eastleigh

Team News
The Daggers will be without Shaun Donnellan and Andre Boucaud following their international call ups. Luke Howell, Matt Robinson, Luke Guttridge, Sam Ling and Curtley Williams will be looking for a place in the squad as they return from injury.

Previous Meetings
The Daggers last met York in November winning 2-0 thanks to goals from Hawkins and Guttridge.

Fixtures
There is a full list of fixtures in the Vanarama National League on Saturday. 3pm KO (Unless Stated)
Lincoln V Forest Green (12:15pm)
Bromley V Chester
Daggers V York
Eastleigh v Gateshead
Guiseley V Dover
Macclesfield V Aldershot
Solihull V Barrow
Southport V Boreham Wood
Sutton V North Ferriby
Tranmere V Braintree
Woking V Maidstone
Wrexham V Torquay

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media:
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
